name: Local Community
description: What will living in a local community mean in 50 years?

actions.template:
Ursula tended her hydroponic garden. _________, her _________, humming by her side. Ursula was happy that she _________. Carrie helped her to _________. Self-sufficient domes bloomed around them, a vibrant community thrived within their shared living space. It was a warm winter day in 2074. Suddenly, an alarm blared, disrupting the peace.
